clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of VB-111 in Subjects With Advanced Differentiated Thyroid Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: Vascular Biogenics Ltd. operating as VBL Therapeutics

clinical_study.source: Vascular Biogenics Ltd. operating as VBL Therapeutics

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to examine the safety and evaluate the response of VB-111 on DTC.
